name: .CK3
summary: Learn about .CK3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open and edit plain text CK3 files with Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or any other text editor. If your CK3 file is Zip-compressed, you must decompress it (with Apple Archive Utility, 7-Zip, or another Zip-decompression tool) to access the gamestate file it contains. Then, you can open and edit the gamestate file with any text editor.
(To use a gamestate file with Crusader Kings III, you must either repackage it within a compressed CK3 file or rename the gamestate file to use the .ck3 extension.)
To use a CK3 file with Crusader Kings III, place it in the game's save games directory. This directory is usually located at:
Then, the next time you start Crusader Kings III, you'll be able to load the saved game your CK3 file contains.
